channel.title: Miscellaneous objects on IGDB.com API Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Miscellaneous objects on IGDB.com API Documentation

item.title: Alternative name
item.description: Example { "name": "Thief: o Projeto Negro", "comment": "Brazilian title" } Fields Name Type Mandatory name string + comment string -

item.title: ESRB
item.description: Example { "rating": "4" } Fields Name Type Mandatory Comment rating unsigned integer + See the ESRB rating value reference synopsis string -

item.title: External
item.description: Example { "steam": "294810" } Fields Name Type Mandatory Comment steam string - The steam id.

item.title: Image
item.description: Example { "url": "//images.igdb.com/igdb/image/upload/t_thumb/l3n0zuklmgkloi1udslt.png", "width": 339, "height": 393, "cloudinary_id": "l3n0zuklmgkloi1udslt" } Fields Name Type Mandatory Comment url string + Can be non-IGDB URL cloudinary_id string - Cloudinary slug width unsigned integer - The image’s width in pixels height unsigned integer - The image’s height in pixels

item.title: PEGI
item.description: Example { "rating": "4", "synopsis": "The content of this game is suitable for persons aged 16 years and over only.\nIt contains: Realistic looking violence." } Fields Name Type Mandatory Comment rating unsigned integer + See the PEGI rating value reference synopsis string -

item.title: Platform company
item.description: Example { "company": 12, "comment": "Developed stuff!" } Fields Name Type Mandatory Comment company unsigned 64-bit integer + comment string + What does that company do.

item.title: Platform version
item.description: Example { "url": "https://www.igdb.com/platforms/linux/version/initial-version-04719e9f-bc9e-4b08-982c-50c495215228", "logo": { "url": "//images.igdb.com/igdb/image/upload/t_thumb/pilogm8rythuvcg4cslx.png", "width": 1344, "height": 742, "cloudinary_id": "pilogm8rythuvcg4cslx" }, "name": "Initial version", "slug": "initial-version-04719e9f-bc9e-4b08-982c-50c495215228", "summary": "Linux is a free and open-source (FOSS/FLOSS) Operating System. ...", "release_dates": [ {"date": 694137600000, "region": 8} ] } Fields Name Type Mandatory Comment url string + name string + slug string + cpu string - os string - media string - memory string - online string - output string - storage string - graphics string - resolutions string - connectivity string - logo object - See the Image object reference summary text (long string) - release_dates array of objects - See the Platform version release date object reference developers array of objects - See the Platform company object reference manufacturers array of objects - See the Platform company object reference

item.title: Platform version release date
item.description: Example { "date": 123456789, "region": 8 } Fields Name Type Mandatory Comment date 64-bit integer + Unix epoch region unsigned integer + See the Region value reference

item.title: Release date
item.description: The Release date miscellaneous object is identical to the Release date object except that it doesn’t have an ID. Release dates are in milliseconds.

item.title: Time to beat
item.description: Example { "hastly": 30200, "normally": 44550, "completely": 111150 } Fields Name Type Mandatory Comment hastly unsigned 64-bit integer - Number of seconds normally unsigned 64-bit integer - Number of seconds completely unsigned 64-bit integer - Number of seconds

item.title: Video
item.description: Example { "name": "Trailer", "video_id": "9C543B6uJ88" } Fields Name Type Mandatory Comment name string + video_id string + Youtube slug

item.title: Website
item.description: Example { "category": 1, "url": "https://www.igdb.com" } Fields Name Type Mandatory Comment category unsigned 64-bit integer + See the Website category value reference url string + Url to website
